etymology.description: 西 + 門 + 町 = “West Gate” + town ward/quarter.
etymology.interpretation: Name of the area by Taipei’s former West Gate, established as an urban ward during Japanese rule. Retains the Japanese administrative morpheme 町 in the toponym.
etymology.simplification: Only 门 is simplified (門→门) to reduce strokes; 西 and 町 remain unchanged.

parts.english: door; gate; school/discipline; classifier for lessons
ward (Japanese 町); town block; neighborhood; ancient admin unit

examples.chinese: 我们明天去西门町逛街(我們明天去西門町逛街)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān qù Xīmén Dīng guàngjiē.
examples.english: We’re going to Ximending to shop tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 西门町是台北很热闹的商圈(西門町是臺北很熱鬧的商圈)。
examples.pinyin: Xīmén Dīng shì Táiběi hěn rènào de shāngquān.
examples.english: Ximending is a very bustling shopping district in Taipei.

examples.chinese: 在西门町可以看电影、吃小吃、买潮牌(在西門町可以看電影、吃小吃、買潮牌)。
examples.pinyin: Zài Xīmén Dīng kěyǐ kàn diànyǐng, chī xiǎochī, mǎi cháopái.
examples.english: In Ximending you can watch movies, eat street snacks, and buy trendy brands.
